text: Hi - Great to be a part of this slack channel. Getting back into the development and capabilities - it has been years - we just merged with another company and are going through rebranding and redirecting - we are a really small team so hope to leverage the insights here.
Hello - I am a developer with deep experience in web technologies such as node, .NET, etc. for about 20 years.  I am just getting started in HubSpot development.
I am curious if there is a tutorial that shows you soup to nuts on how to build a grid on a CMS page that displays all your companies?
